reviews.review: This is one of the best puzzle games I've played.

one of the best games ever.
Pra quem gosta de puzzle, é um prato cheio. Tanto solo quando com amigo, dá uma ótima diversão. Algumas fases são bem desafiantes, e a história é muito boa. Super recomendo.
Additictive gameplay, witty voice acting and an engrossing story keep me playing for hours

剧情吸引人，好玩双人模式一起合作跟好还有很多的创意工坊
Excelente diseño de niveles, interesante y retador. Cuentan de forma maravillosa una historia muy interesante y divertida.
хз как там в соло покупал для коопа но кооп рекомендую

This game is freaking awesome
I just love all of it, the puzzles, mechanics, the story line(s), the multiplayer, ALL OF IT!
Huge step up from the first game in terms of basically everything.
There's so many new mechanics, the gel, lasers, faith plates, funnels, light bridges, probably more tbh
There's tons of playtime worth, and the achievements are all fun and enjoyable to get (except for rock portal scissors, curse you valve.) heck, even at the time of this review I've only gotten half the achievements and haven't even completed the co-op mode yet.
The story is just such a delight, the story for the first game was fine but after playing this game I just think of the first game as a glorified build up to this.
Co-op is fun, plenty ways to plunge your friends into a lake of acid
The puzzles always manage to keep things fresh and interesting, and the story events help put buffers in between, unlike the first game's system of puzzle after puzzle. You visit plenty different unique locations and I love the bit where you got to explore old aperture.  
I love this video game franchise please make portal 3 (:
В этой игре много чего интересного: Графон, сюжет, но самое главное это оптимизация. Я могу играть на бабушкином компьютере на ультрах почти без лагов. Однозначно 10 тортиков из 10.
если жизнь дает тебе лимоны сделай лимонад

When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
Сюжет - топ, геймплей - топ, графика - топ, озвучка - топ. Вывод - игра топ :)
